sub_title: Senior Consultant in Climate Change and Sustainability Services EY
summary:
| Results oriented, intercultural communicator and solid interpersonal skills |

Supporting organizations to excel in #sustainability through the identification of risks & dependencies, impacts' management and performance measurement. Strong in biodiversity assessments and knowledgable in ISO14.001 for environment, ISO 45.001 health and safety and ISO 35.000 risk management.

Graduated summa cum laude with a Masters in Biological Sciences and holding an honours in Environmental Biology, both at University of Chile. 

"Professional experiences in Chile, New Zealand and the Netherlands, have really marked my working style. I valorate team working, multiculture and flexibility at my working place because I believe that creates much more resilient groups"
 
Contributed on several scientific publications in ecology and performed presentations on international conferences.

"Furthermore I am an enthusiastic professional and passionate for Nature. I believe in the intrinsic value of #biodiversity, but I'm aware about the great impact it has in human wellness. I enjoy challenges and keep learning the latest releases on my field"
